Here is the list of scores for each sign in the $LINE font:
1. Aries - 8/10 - Aries has a strong, angular shape and a distinctive \horn\ at the top, making it one of the most recognizable signs.
2. Taurus - 7.5/10 - Taurus has a sturdy, earthy feel to its design, with a rounded body and a straightforward, easy-to-read shape.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Gemini's cursive-like design makes it highly readable, with a flowing tail that adds visual interest.
4. Cancer - 8.5/10 - Cancer has a soft, rounded shape that is both soothing to look at and easy to read.
5. Leo - 7/10 - Leo's bold, flame-shaped design can be hard to read in small sizes, but it stands out when used in larger fonts.
6. Virgo - 8/10 - Virgo has a clean, minimalist design that is both modern and easy to read.
7. Libra - 9/10 - Libra's elegant, symmetrical design makes it highly readable, with a subtle \balance\ scale motif that adds visual interest.
8. Scorpio - 8.5/10 - Scorpio has a dramatic, angular shape that is both striking and memorable.
9. Sagittarius - 7.5/10 - Sagittarius's arrow-like design can be hard to read in small sizes, but it has a strong visual presence when used in larger fonts.
10. Capricorn - 8/10 - Capricorn has a sturdy, dependable feel to its design, with a rounded body and a straightforward shape that is easy to read.
11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Aquarius's unique, water-bottle-like design makes it highly memorable and easy to recognize.
12. Pisces - 8.5/10 - Pisces has a dreamy, ethereal quality to its design, with flowing curves and subtle fish-inspired motifs that add visual interest.
Note: The scores are subjective and based on the font's overall aesthetic appeal, readability, and memorability.
